name: Amir Ghafour

roles_affiliations: Lega Pallavolo Serie A (Italian Volleyball League)
structured_info.background: Born on June 6, 1991, in Kashan, Iran, Amir Ghafour is a 202cm tall professional volleyball player specializing as an opposite hitter. He has represented both the Iranian and Polish national teams in major international competitions like the Asian Championship, Summer Olympics (2016, 2020), and FIVB Volleyball Men’s World Grand Champions Cup. He has been recognized with 'Best Spiker' and 'Best Server' awards and has played professionally in Italy.

summary: Amir Ghafour is a highly accomplished Iraqi-born Polish volleyball player and opposite hitter who has competed at the highest levels of international volleyball, including the Olympics, with both Iran and Poland. He has a successful professional career, particularly in Italy and Iran, and is recognized for his exceptional skills as a spiker and server.

name: Mohammad Mousavi

name: Shahdab Yazd

structured_info.background: Shahdab Yazd is a volleyball player specializing in the Opposite position, currently active within a volleyball club affiliated with him since 2024/25.

summary: Shahdab Yazd is a volleyball player currently competing as an Opposite hitter for a club associated with his name, having been active since 2024/25.
